txt.en: '[placeholder], what know you of dwarves in this place? I must say I was taken aback by a fellow who came by here unexpectedly. He claimed to know you and said that you should meet him near some caves some distance north-west of here to... how did he say it? \qHave some fun?\q\n\n'I will warn you, there is a den of goblins up that way.'
'Ah, [placeholder], fancy us meeting in a place like this! But then, where else would we find enough goblins to make sport of?'
Dagoras told you that an oddly intense dwarf passed by his camp a short while ago, leaving a message for you. He asked you to meet him by a set of caves to the north-west to 'Have some fun.'
Talk to the dwarf Dagoras spoke of
The dwarf Dagoras spoke of can be found near some caves some distance to the north-west of Dagoras' camp.\n\nThe dwarf that Dagoras described is reminiscent of Ondor, whom you met in the Heathfells.
